medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started 2 days prior to presentation. It is described as dull, constant, and radiates to the back. The intensity increases with palpation. The patient has experienced a similar episode about a year ago. Constipation has been reported since the day prior to admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: DM2, Hypercholesterolemia, asthma, Diverticulosis, Right inguinal hernia repair (x2), umbilical hernia repair, Meckel's diverticulitis, previous SBO secondary to adhesions, Gastritis with positive H. Pylori (s/p Prevpak treatment), Prostate nodule, history of OSA (declined CPAP).
